channel.title: iaas manager on DefinIT

item.title: Deploying fully distributed vRealize Automation IaaS components â€“ Part 2: Database, Web and Manager services
item.description: Now that the prerequisites for the IaaS layer have been completed, it’s time to move on to the actual installation of the IaaS components, starting with the database. We then move onto the first Web server, which also imports the ModelManagerData configuration to the database, populating the database with all of the info the IaaS layer needs out of the box. We then install the second Web server before moving on to the active Manager server.
